block_summaries.summary: There are two kinds of people who try to perfect their lives, but both are unable to do so. One category, Shilapuravapad explains is that of the empiric philosophers. So they can never understand God.
key_points: There are two kinds of people who try to perfect their lives, but both are unable to do so.
One category, Shilapuravapad explains is that of the empiric philosophers who try to speculate and try to understand what is truth.
So using their own limited understanding, their intelligence, they think they will be able to understand Lord.
Although they cannot understand Lord.
but they think they can understand the creator of the universe.

block_summaries.summary: Love of God is not a sentiment, it is a science. Science means there are specific symptoms of it. So, Urjana is grief-stricken that I have to fight with these people.
key_points: So, Urjana is grief-stricken that I have to fight with these people.
I have to kill my family members, Arjuna is very much worried and he is having a nervous breakdown.
So these are the symptoms of great material attachment and similar is the manifestation of symptoms of spontaneous love of God.
So that is why one has to be very expert but it is important that science, that love of God is not a sentiment, it is a science.

block_summaries.summary: When Krishna explained to Arjuna the fundamental spiritual life and to come to platform of divinity he asked, what are the symptoms of a person who is having this divine consciousness? So what does Lord Krishna describe? From here we can understand whether a person is actually perfect or he is simply having sentimental emotional display. So that is why it is told in the moral instructions that a fool is fool. as long as it does not speak.
key_points: It is not something just like there are symptoms of any disease.
Similarly there are symptoms of a person having love of God.
So this one has to carefully understand.
If somebody is thinking that yes I am also having, I have come to the platform of Rama Bhakti.
I need not follow those regulations, understand the philosophy.

This is called liberated platform, which we have to attain in this life.

Because I am very much attached to my sons, I want them to rule.
So that is why these material attachments are very dangerous.
